did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Seleciónes del Archivo de Hidalgo del Parral, 1634-1776
did.abstract: Nine bound volumes of Xeroxed copies of selected transcripts from the Archivo de Hidalgo del Parral, 1634-1776

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Seleciónes del Archivo de Hidalgo del Parral, (MS 215). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

originalsloc.p: Originals are located in Archivo Histórico del Hidalgo Parral, Chihuahua, Mexico.

bioghist.head: Historial Note
bioghist.p: The materials were compiled by Jose G. Rocha and translated by and typed by Campbell W. Pennington, May 1955. The set was a gift from Paul McLennan Roca.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 9 bound volumes.

list.item: Volumes 1-4: English translations by Campbell W. Pennington.
Volume 5: Guia, 1632 to 1749, translated by José G. Rocha, and typed by Campbell W. Pennington.
Volumes 6-9: Spanish transcriptions by Campbell W. Pennington.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Xeroxed copies of typescript transcriptions of documents related to administration, war, civil and criminal cases, mines and land claims in Hidalgo del Parral, Chichuahua, Mexico. The materials were compiled by Jose G. Rocha and translated by and typed by Campbell W. Pennington, May 1955. The set was a gift from Paul McLennan Roca.
